WorkItem.Description:
When I optimize my DPS, I used to use Hunter DPS as the main optimization and Hit Rating as the additional requirement to get the highest dps while ensuring that I am hit capped.
 
With 2.2.27, the Hit Rating optimization was removed and "% Chance to Miss" was added instead.
 
Not knowing how it works, I first tried to optimize without using % chance to miss as the additional requirement. The results came out with a nice dps rating, but I was not hit capped which was a problem.
 
I assumed that I would never want to miss, so I put 0% in the "% chance to miss field", and when I clicked optimize, my Rawr program encountered and error and had to be closed.
I tried both "Less than or Equal to" and "More than or Equal to" and still received the same error.
I also tried using numbers 1-8, receiving the same error every time.
 
I've included my character file. Hopefully this helps, thank you.
 
Nanaya of Boulderfist.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Optimize Requirement '% Chance to Miss' error

Comments.Message: I had this same problem. I am glad to see that it has been fixed.
